question: When did T-Rex live? When did stegosaurus live?
answer: Tyrannosaurus lived ~68 million years ago during the cretacous period. Stegosaurus lived 150 million years ago. T-Rex and Stegosaurus lived further apart in time that T-Rex and people.

question: What years was Dalip Singh Saund in Office?
answer: 1957 to 1963. He suffered a sever stroke in 1962. He was unable to campaign, but still won the Democratic primary.
